title: Workers
description: Workers is an informational book that tells about workers from the farm to the dinner table as wheat becomes bread. The various workers are presented in sequential order, from the farmer who harvests the wheat to the family member who serves it for dinner. Pictures support early readers.
meta: baker, farmer, grocer, miller, trucker, workers
